scripts.package-android: mkdir -p android/app/build/jsbundle/assets/ && mkdir -p android/app/build/jsbundle/res && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/build/jsbundle/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/jsbundle/res
scripts.codepush-production: npm run codepush-ios-production && npm run codepush-android-production
scripts.codepush-ios-production: ENVFILE=.env.production appcenter codepush release-react --private-key-path ./codepush-privatekey.pem -a Serto/Serto -d Production --plist-file ios/Serto/Info.plist --output-dir ./build/ios && npm run sentry-ios-codepush-production
scripts.codepush-android-production: ENVFILE=.env.production appcenter codepush release-react -a Serto/Serto-Android -d Production --private-key-path ./codepush-privatekey.pem --output-dir ./build/android && npm run sentry-android-codepush-production
scripts.codepush-staging: npm run codepush-ios-staging && npm run codepush-android-staging
scripts.codepush-ios-staging: ENVFILE=.env.production appcenter codepush release-react -a Serto/Serto -d Staging --private-key-path ./codepush-privatekey.pem --plist-file ios/Serto/Info.plist --output-dir ./build/ios/CodePush && npm run sentry-ios-codepush-staging
scripts.codepush-android-staging: ENVFILE=.env.production appcenter codepush release-react -a Serto/Serto-Android -d Staging --private-key-path ./codepush-privatekey.pem --output-dir ./build/android && npm run sentry-android-codepush-staging
scripts.sentry-ios-codepush-production: SENTRY_PROPERTIES=./sentry.properties sentry-cli react-native appcenter Serto/Serto ios ./build/ios/CodePush --deployment Production
scripts.sentry-android-codepush-production: SENTRY_PROPERTIES=./sentry.properties sentry-cli react-native appcenter Serto/Serto-Android android ./build/android/CodePush --deployment Production
scripts.sentry-ios-codepush-staging: SENTRY_PROPERTIES=./sentry.properties sentry-cli react-native appcenter Serto/Serto ios ./build/ios/CodePush --deployment Staging
scripts.sentry-android-codepush-staging: SENTRY_PROPERTIES=./sentry.properties sentry-cli react-native appcenter Serto/Serto-Android android ./build/android/CodePush --deployment Staging
